actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize transportation for certain persons engaged in the continuity of Government programs.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize the Administrator of General Services to provide transportation for persons engaged in the continuity of Government programs to and from their place of employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize transportation for certain persons engaged in the continuity of Government programs.
